apa rata ehi wishishta bhugoliya pihitima upayogi kotagena batahira ha nagenahira ya karana nawuka, guwan, wanija, welanda ha danume kendrayak lesa diyunu kirimata mama piyawara gannemi“ (mahinda chinthana - idiri dakma -9 pituwa) ratata pana dima sandaha aluthenma patan ganna bawa kiyamin yalith warak oba athata di athi ‘anagathayata sahathikayak‘ namathi porondu pathraya kiyawima mandakata nawatha oba aapasu hari balanne nam owun wisin kalin di athi eki palamu poronduwata kumak sidu wi athda yanna wataha gathahakiya.ee anuwa ihatha ki pancha bala kendraya nirmanaya kota shri lankawa aasiyawe aashcharyaya bawata path kirima owun wisin awasan kara athda nathahoth ee gana kisith nokiya eya iwathata wisikara aluth porondu malawak laba demin ‘kiyana de karana bawatath, karana de kiyana bawatath‘ katamatha dodawamin sitinne me rate janathawa pilibanda ketharam awathakseruwakin yukthawada yanna oba wisinma thiranaya kala yuthuya.

mewani thrasthawadi praharayan anumatha nokaranawa pamanak nowa eya pilikulin hela dakina atharama aparadhakaruwan soya ganimata saha mewani thrastha kriya mandalimata shri lanka rajaya uparima sahaya laba dimata sudanam bawath widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya sandahan keleya.this wasaraka mlechcha thrasthawadayen pida windi ratak lesa mewani thrastha praharayan ge athi bihisunu ha kuriru bawa manawin awabodha kara gena sitina shri lankawa lokaye oonama thaneka pawathina ewani thrastha kriyakarakamwalata erehiwa athwal banda ganimata ha uparima sahaya dimata sudanamin sitina bawath ehi dakwe.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
